Articles.Content:
A Few Days Ago

In a SPH Not so far away....

![PHPUUP1.png](http://i.imgur.com/PHPUUP1.png)(Star wars theme in plays in background)

**Wait** **, Really? THE X-Wing Fighter?**

Yup. And it comes equipped with some missiles!

**Cool! Part Count? Kerbal Capacity?**

101 parts. Can hold 2 Kerbals.

**Awesome! Download link?**

Link at bottom of post.

**How do I fly it?**

Like a normal spaceplane, but with RCS on. (easier to steer that way)

**Are/will you be posting more star wars replicas in the future?**

Yes. Tell me what to build next in the comments below!

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0Bw2SmUyal34LOWdqbE95cTN1aUE

**Download Here**

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/KSOtQ)

Hope you Like it! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Luke

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-30T21:09:37Z" title="07/30/2015 09:09  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 30, 2015</time> by lukethecoder64**

Wow this would go great with my Falcon!

JR
Star Wars week continues. This is nicely done dude. Maybe some more pics?

> 
> Very nice and clean looking!

> 
> Star Wars week continues. This is nicely done dude.

Thank you both!

> 
> Maybe some more pics?

Sure thing! Will add an album to OP.
I'm more impressed this thing flies okay under stock aero than the accuracy of the replica.

> 
> I'm more impressed this thing flies okay under stock aero than the accuracy of the replica.

Thank You!

[But actually, I've seen some pretty weird stuff with the post-1.0 areo](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/126195-Donuts-are-Wings?highlight=Donuts+wings)
